comment._content:
J. P. Farrell was an Irish nationalist politician and MP in the UK Parliament.

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J_P_Farrell

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: But this wretch is John Paul Farrell, 60ish, a Bronx sailor, sailmaker, tenement janitor and burglar, believed by police to be insane, who built bombs in three cigar boxes, which killed two women and wounded others. One bomb recipient was New York Judge Otto Rosalsky. Story in New York Times, February 5, 1913: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9D0CE6D9103CE6... Another NYT story, February 6, 1913: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9F00E1D81E3AE6... New York Times story, February 7, 1913: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9806E... Another Bain/LOC photo of John Paul Farrell, under arrest: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3065186277/in/photostream/]
